Levels.stranger_face: The participant is shown that they will be playing with the stranger.
Levels.event_stranger_neutral: The participant experienced a neutral outcome during the outcome phase with the stranger.
Levels.event_stranger_reward: The participant experienced a reward outcome during the outcome phase with the stranger.
Levels.event_stranger_punish: The participant experienced a punishment outcome during the outcome phase with the stranger.
Levels.computer_non-faceclea: The participant is shown that they will be playing with the computer.
Levels.event_computer_neutral: The participant experienced a neutral outcome during the outcome phase with the computer.
Levels.event_computer_reward: The participant experienced a neutral outcome during the outcome phase with the computer.
Levels.event_compter_punish: The participant experienced a neutral outcome during the outcome phase with the computer.
Levels.friend_face: The participant is shown that they will be playing with the friend.
Levels.event_friend_neutral: The participant experienced a neutral outcome during the outcome phase with the friend.
Levels.event_friend_reward: The participant experienced a neutral outcome during the outcome phase with the friend.
Levels.event_friend_punish: The participant experienced a neutral outcome during the outcome phase with the friend.
